attributes.action: i would like for the government to lift laws on carry weapons for SELF DEFENCE
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government and parliament so consider these with a serious mindset on fixing the disgusting and cruel injustices 

I feel this is the best possible way of stopping women feeling as if they cannot defend them self's
attributes.background: I would like for the government to lift laws on carrying things such as a tazer guns pepper spray ect... for women

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Make it legal to carry non-lethal self defence weapons: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577568
